name: MPMusicPlayerApplicationController
desc: A media player object that you use to revise the queue that’s currently playing.

items.name: func perform(queueTransaction: (MPMusicPlayerControllerMutableQueue) -> Void, completionHandler: (MPMusicPlayerControllerQueue, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Changes the contents of the media items in the queue.

items.name: static let MPMusicPlayerControllerQueueDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Indicates the music player’s queue changed.
